scripts.pack:win32: npm run clean:win32 && electron-packager resources/app CRIS-Reporting-PACS-Viewer --platform win32 --arch ia32 --app-version 1.0.2 --version-string.CompanyName="Healthcare Software Solutions" --version-string.ProductName="CRIS Reporting PACS Viewer" --icon resources/app/images/desktop-icon.ico  --out dist/
scripts.pack:win64: npm run clean:win64 && electron-packager resources/app CRIS-Reporting-PACS-Viewer --platform win32 --arch x64 --app-version 1.0.2 --version-string.CompanyName="Healthcare Software Solutions" --version-string.ProductName="CRIS Reporting PACS Viewer" --icon resources/app/images/desktop-icon.ico  --out dist/
